title: General Resources
description: College often comes with additional expenses depending on a student's living situation.

title: Food Insecurity
description: College is an exciting time while some of these experiences can be thrilling, others may simply leave you feeling unsatisfied.

title: Housing Concerns
description: More than 30% of college students said they did not have enough money to pay for housing, while another 35% said the same.

title: School Costs
description: College tuition prices are a lot higher today compared with two decades ago. For instance, the average cost for tuition is more than it should be.
